statements: SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, user_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission FROM access_control WHERE resource_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE permission LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission = 'write' AND user_id = 4 ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, resource_id FROM access_control WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_control WHERE permission IN ('read', 'write');
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1 AND permission LIKE 'r%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS resource_count FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(resource_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM permission_settings WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT permission_level FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2001;
SELECT * FROM permission_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY setting_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM permission_settings WHERE setting_name = 'admin' AND setting_value LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS permissions_count FROM access_control_list GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY permissions_count DESC;

SELECT access_control_list.*, permission_settings.setting_name FROM access_control_list JOIN permission_settings ON access_control_list.user_id = permission_settings.user_id WHERE access_control_list.user_id = 3;

SELECT access_control_list.record_id, permission_settings.setting_name FROM access_control_list LEFT JOIN permission_settings ON access_control_list.user_id = permission_settings.user_id AND permission_settings.setting_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY access_control_list.record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT permission, resource_id FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, created_at FROM resource_data WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE resource_id = 500;
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1 AND permission = 'read';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS resource_count FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING resource_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM resource_data WHERE resource_type = 'document' OR resource_type = 'image' AND resource_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permission_settings ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT object_id, permission_set FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_set LIKE 'read%';
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 3 AND permission_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, object_id FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_set = 'read';
SELECT * FROM permission_settings ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 2 AND permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists;
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id FROM access_control_lists WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 1 AND resource_id = 5;
SELECT permission, user_id FROM access_control_lists WHERE permission LIKE '%write%';
SELECT id, permission FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 1 AND resource_id = 101
SELECT id, user_id, permission FROM access_control_lists WHERE permission = 'READ' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 2 AND (permission = 'WRITE' OR permission = 'DELETE')
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_lists WHERE id IN (3, 4, 5)
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE permission LIKE 'WRITE%' ORDER BY resource_id DESC
